welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fanzeres, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'OPO Free Wi-Fi' and following the prompts.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Braga Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Braga Airport is used for the shipment and handling of goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
